Module kivakit.core.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.filesystem.spi

Interface DiskService

  • public interface DiskService
    A service provider interface (SPI) for filesystem disks. Implementers provide:
    • free() - Number of bytes free on the disk
    • size() - The total size of the disk
    • usable() - The number of bytes on the disk that are usable
    • root() - The root folder of the disk
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    FileSystemService

      default Percent percentUsable()  
      FolderService root()  
      Bytes size()  
      Bytes usable()
